column1: Smoque BBQ////This place only does outdoor dining for the time being. My husband and I went here for the first time for dinner because we will be moving to the area in a few days. It was delicious and the weather was nice
column2: so we had an enjoyable experience. Something to note
column3: we were obviously having a brain fart because we thought the mac and cheese was the cornbread
column4: but it just looked super similar. Regardless
column5: the host Henry was super helpful with helping us and even after we realized our mistake
column6: they still let us keep the extra mac (so sorry!). Truly though
column8: friendly and efficient. You don't really see that nowadays
column9: especially with working outside. We are excited to keep on going here. Â
